ðŸ“– Summary: branch-pad is an interactive Python notebook environment that allows users to create and explore multiple branches of code execution. It provides features for branch management, independent code execution environments, snapshotting, versioning, and branch comparison. It also supports exporting notebooks and deployment packages.
